title: What are the experiences of teaching? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has its good experiences and bad experiences. Depending on the school district and school you work at is how hard or how much easier it is to teach. Depending also on what grade you have is also what type of experiences you will have. I have been teaching for 20 years now and can tell you that I look forward to all of my breaks. Teaching is a blessing but it is one of the most difficult jobs you could ever have.
